content:
TokenColor Enum

Definition

Specifies the colors that individual units of code should have when text is being colorized in an editor. The members of this enumeration are used by the crosoft.JScript.ITokenColorInfo.Color* property of ITokenColorInfo objects.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("78008402-40D4-30BF-BD91-A61D8815625E")]
public enum TokenColor
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
TokenColor

Fields

COLOR_COMMENT

The color for a unit of code that represents a comment.
COLOR_CONDITIONAL_COMP

Not used.
COLOR_IDENTIFIER

The color for a unit of code that represents an identifier.
COLOR_KEYWORD

The color for a unit of code that represents a keyword.
COLOR_NUMBER

The color for a unit of code that represents a numeric literal.
COLOR_OPERATOR

The color for a unit of code that represents an operator.
COLOR_STRING

The color for a unit of code that represents a string literal.
COLOR_TEXT

The color for a unit of code that represents text. This is the default value.
